BioMethod.description: methodology description of a portion of a bioinformatics pipeline

additional_argument.description: any additional arguments that differ from the default

program.description: name of the program used for this portion of the pipeline

program_description.description: a short description of what this method does

program_version.description: the version of generation method, should be in the format of v[MAJOR].[MINOR].[PATCH]

BioMethod.title: BioMethod

additional_methods.description: any additional methods used to analyze the data

bioinformatics_method_name.description: name of the collection of methods is called, e.g. pipeline

demultiplexing_method.description: the demultiplexing method used to separate raw reads from barcodes and primer targets

denoising_method.description: the method used to de-noise and/or cluster the raw reads

BioinformaticsRunInfo.description: Information about the pipeline run that generated some of the microhaplotype detected and reads_by_stage

bioinformatics_methods_id.description: the index into the bioinformatics_methods_info list

bioinformatics_run_name.description: a name to for this run

run_date.description: the date when the run was done, should be YYYY-MM-DD

BioinformaticsRunInfo.title: BioinformaticsRunInfo

ExperimentInfo.description: Information about a specific amplification and sequencing of a specimen

accession.description: ERA/SRA accession number for the sample if it was submitted

experiment_sample_name.description: a unique identifier for this sequence/amplification run on a specimen_name

panel_id.description: the index into the panel_info list

plate_col.description: the column the specimen was in

plate_name.description: a name of plate the specimen was in

plate_row.description: the row the specimen was in

sequencing_info_id.description: the index into the sequencing_info list

specimen_id.description: the index into the specimen_info list

ExperimentInfo.title: ExperimentInfo

chromosomes.description: a list of chromosomes found within this genome

gff_url.description: a link to the where this genome's annotation file could be downloaded

url.description: a link to the where this genome file could be downloaded

GenomicLocation.description: information on the genomic location of specific sequence

end.description: the end of the location, 0-based positioning

genome_id.description: the index to the genome in the targeted_genomes list that this location refers to

ref_seq.description: the reference sequence of this genomic location

start.description: the start of the location, 0-based positioning

strand.description: which strand the location is, either + for plus strand or - for negative strand

GenomicLocation.title: GenomicLocation

MarkerOfInterest.description: A specific genomic location of interest, e.g. drug resistance, or other phenotypical marker

associations.description: a list of associations with this marker, e.g. SP resistance, etc

MarkerOfInterest.title: MarkerOfInterest

MaskingInfo.description: information about a subsegment of the sequence that should be masked
MaskingInfo.title: MaskingInfo

MicrohaplotypeForTarget.description: Microhaplotype detected for a specific target

mhap_id.description: the index for a microhaplotype for a target in the microhaplotypes_info list, e.g. microhaplotypes_info[mhaps_target_id][mhap_id]

reads.description: the read count associated with this microhaplotype

umis.description: the unique molecular identifier (umi) count associated with this microhaplotype

MicrohaplotypeForTarget.title: MicrohaplotypeForTarget

MicrohaplotypesDetected.description: the microhaplotypes detected in a targeted amplicon analysis

experiment_samples.description: a list of the microhaplotypes detected for a sample by targets

MicrohaplotypesDetected.title: MicrohaplotypesDetected

MicrohaplotypesForSample.description: Microhaplotypes detected for a sample for all targets

experiment_sample_id.description: the index into the experiment_info list

target_results.description: a list of the microhaplotypes detected for a list of targets

MicrohaplotypesForSample.title: MicrohaplotypesForSample

MicrohaplotypesForTarget.description: Microhaplotypes detected for a specific target

haps.description: a list of the microhaplotypes detected for this target

mhaps_target_id.description: the index for a target in the microhaplotypes_info list

MicrohaplotypesForTarget.title: MicrohaplotypesForTarget

PanelInfo.description: information on a panel of targeted amplicon primer pairs

reactions.description: a list of 1 or more reactions that this panel contains, each reactions list the targets that were amplified in that reaction, e.g. pool1, pool2

PanelInfo.title: PanelInfo

ParasiteDensity.description: method and value of determined parasite density

method.description: the method of how this density was obtained

ParasiteDensity.title: ParasiteDensity

PmoGenerationMethod.description: Information about how a PMO was generated

program_version.description: the version of generation method, should be in the format of v[MAJOR].[MINOR].[PATCH]

PmoGenerationMethod.title: PmoGenerationMethod

creation_date.description: the date of when the PMO file was created or modified, should be YYYY-MM-DD

generation_method.description: the generation method to create this PMO

pmo_version.description: the version of the PMO file, should be in the format of v[MAJOR].[MINOR].[PATCH]

PortableMicrohaplotypeObject.description: Information on final results from a targeted amplicon analysis

bioinformatics_methods_info.description: the bioinformatics pipeline/methods used to generated the amplicon analysis for this project

bioinformatics_run_info.description: the runtime info for the bioinformatics pipeline used to generated the amplicon analysis for this project

experiment_info.description: a list of experiments of all the seq/amp of the specimens within this project

microhaplotypes_detected.description: the microhaplotypes detected in this projects

microhaplotypes_info.description: a list of the information on the representative microhaplotypes

panel_info.description: a list of info on the panels

pmo_header.description: the PMO information for this file including version etc

read_counts_by_stage.description: the read counts for different stages of the pipeline

sequencing_info.description: a list of sequencing info for this project

specimen_info.description: a list of specimens of all the samples within this project

target_info.description: a list of info on the targets

targeted_genomes.description: a list of genomes that the targets in TargetInfo refer to

PortableMicrohaplotypeObject.title: PortableMicrohaplotypeObject

location.description: what the intended genomic location of the primer is

ReactionInfo.description: information on a panel of targeted amplicon primer pairs

panel_targets.description: a list of the target indexes in the target_info list

ReactionInfo.title: ReactionInfo

ReadCountsByStage.description: Information on the reads counts at several stages of a pipeline

read_counts_by_experimental_sample_by_st.description: a list by experiment_sample for the counts at each stage

ReadCountsByStage.title: ReadCountsByStage

ReadCountsByStageForExperimentalSample.description: Information on the reads counts at several stages of a pipeline for a experimental_sample

experiment_sample_id.description: the index into the experiment_info list

read_counts_for_targets.description: a list of counts by stage for a target

total_raw_count.description: the raw counts off the sequencing machine that a sample began with

ReadCountsByStageForExperimentalSample.title: ReadCountsByStageForExperimentalSample

ReadCountsByStageForTarget.description: Information on the reads counts at several stages of a pipeline for a target

stages.description: the read counts by each stage

target_id.description: the index into the target_info list

ReadCountsByStageForTarget.title: ReadCountsByStageForTarget

RepresentativeMicrohaplotype.description: the representative sequence for a microhaplotype, similar to a fast(a/q) format

alt_annotations.description: a list of additional annotations associated with this microhaplotype, e.g. wildtype, amino acid changes etc

microhaplotype_name.description: an optional name for this microhaplotype

quality.description: the ansi fastq per base quality score for this sequence, this is optional

RepresentativeMicrohaplotype.title: RepresentativeMicrohaplotype

RepresentativeMicrohaplotypes.description: a collection of representative sequences for microhaplotypes for all targets

targets.description: a list of the microhaplotype for each targets

RepresentativeMicrohaplotypes.title: RepresentativeMicrohaplotypes

RepresentativeMicrohaplotypesForTarget.description: a list of the representative sequence for a microhaplotypes, similar to a fast(a/q) format

microhaplotypes.description: a list of the microhaplotypes detected for a target

target_id.description: the index into the target_info list

RepresentativeMicrohaplotypesForTarget.title: RepresentativeMicrohaplotypesForTarget

lib_kit.description: Name, version, and applicable cell or cycle numbers for the kit used to prepare libraries and load cells or chips for sequencing. If possible, include a part number, e.g. MiSeq Reagent Kit v3 (150-cycle), MS-102-3001

lib_layout.description: Specify the configuration of reads, e.g. paired-end

lib_screen.description: Describe enrichment, screening, or normalization methods applied during amplification or library preparation, e.g. size selection 390bp, diluted to 1 ng DNA/sample

nucl_acid_amp.description: Link to a reference or kit that describes the enzymatic amplification of nucleic acids

nucl_acid_amp_date.description: the date of the nucleoacid amplification

nucl_acid_ext.description: Link to a reference or kit that describes the recovery of nucleic acids from the sample

nucl_acid_ext_date.description: the date of the nucleoacid extraction

pcr_cond.description: the method/conditions for PCR, List PCR cycles used to amplify the target

seq_center.description: Name of facility where sequencing was performed (lab, core facility, or company)

seq_date.description: the date of sequencing, should be YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD

seq_instrument.description: the sequencing instrument used to sequence the run, e.g. ILLUMINA, Illumina MiSeq

sequencing_info_name.description: a name of for the sequencing done, e.g. batch1

alternate_identifiers.description: a list of optional alternative names for the samples

collection_country.description: the name of country collected in, would be the same as admin level 0

collection_date.description: the date of the sample collection

collector.description: the name of the primary person managing the specimen

date_of_birth.description: if specimen is from a person, the date of birth of that person

geo_admin1.description: geographical admin level 1, the secondary large demarcation of a nation (nation = admin level 0)

geo_admin2.description: geographical admin level 2, the third large demarcation of a nation (nation = admin level 0)

geo_admin3.description: geographical admin level 3, the third large demarcation of a nation (nation = admin level 0)

host_taxon_id.description: optional the NCBI taxonomy number of the host of the organism

individual_id.description: an identifier for the individual a specimen was collected from

lat_lon.description: the latitude and longitude of the collection site of the specimen

parasite_density_info.description: one or more parasite densities in microliters for this specimen

plate_col.description: the column the specimen was in

plate_name.description: a name of plate the specimen was in

plate_row.description: the row the specimen was in

project_name.description: a name of the project under which the sample is organized

samp_collect_device.description: the way the sample was collected, e.g. whole blood, dried blood spot, etc

samp_store_loc.description: the sample store site, address or facility name

samp_taxon_id.description: the NCBI taxonomy number of the organism of interest

sample_comments.description: any additional comments about the sample

specimen_sex.description: if specimen is from a person, the sex listed for that person

StageReadCounts.description: Information on the reads counts at several stages

stage.description: the stage of the pipeline, e.g. demultiplexed, denoised, etc

StageReadCounts.title: StageReadCounts

TargetInfo.description: Information about a specific target within a genome

forward_primers.description: A list of forward primers associated with this target

gene_name.description: an identifier of the gene, if any, is being covered with this targeted

insert_location.description: the intended genomic location of the insert of the amplicon (the location between the end of the forward primer and the beginning of the reverse primer)

reverse_primers.description: A list of reverse primers associated with this target

target_attributes.description: a list of classification type for the primer target

TargetInfo.title: TargetInfo

description: Information on final results from a targeted amplicon analysis

bioinformatics_methods_info.description: the bioinformatics pipeline/methods used to generated the amplicon analysis for this project

bioinformatics_run_info.description: the runtime info for the bioinformatics pipeline used to generated the amplicon analysis for this project

experiment_info.description: a list of experiments of all the seq/amp of the specimens within this project

microhaplotypes_detected.description: the microhaplotypes detected in this projects

microhaplotypes_info.description: a list of the information on the representative microhaplotypes

panel_info.description: a list of info on the panels

pmo_header.description: the PMO information for this file including version etc

read_counts_by_stage.description: the read counts for different stages of the pipeline

sequencing_info.description: a list of sequencing info for this project

specimen_info.description: a list of specimens of all the samples within this project

target_info.description: a list of info on the targets

targeted_genomes.description: a list of genomes that the targets in TargetInfo refer to

title: portable-microhaplotype-object
